data.comment: The match is underway in Charleroi.
Antwerp's Dylan Batubinsika has been booked in Charleroi.
In the minute 14, Dorian Dessoleil (Charleroi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Shamar Nicholson scores to make it 1-0 at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
Ali Gholizadeh with an assist there.
In the minute 22, Birger Verstraete (Antwerp) has been shown a straight red card by referee Alexandre Boucaut.
Maxime Busi (Charleroi) gets a yellow card.
The away team replace Lior Refaelov with Martin Hongla.
In the minute 39, Ryota Morioka (Charleroi) has received a yellow card from Alexandre Boucaut.
Pieter Gerkens (Antwerp) has received a first yellow card.
At Stade du Pays de Charleroi, Faris Haroun has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
The second-half is now underway.
Koji Miyoshi is replacing Didier Lamkel Ze for the away team.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Guillaume Gillet with Frank Tsadjout. This is the first substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
Nicolas Penneteau for Charleroi has been booked by Alexandre Boucaut and receives a first yellow card.
Karim Belhocine is making the team's second substitution at Stade du Pays de Charleroi with Lucas Ribeiro replacing Ali Gholizadeh.
The match has come to a close in Charleroi. The final score is 2-0.
Great finish from Shamar Nicholson to give Charleroi a 2-0 lead.
Great play from Lucas Ribeiro to set up the goal.
